title: Part 2
content: AT CHRISTMINSTER "Save his own soul he hath no star."--SWINBURNE. "Notitiam primosque gradus vicinia fecit; Tempore crevit amor."--OVID. “唯有他心灵，别无引路里。”——斯文朋 “比邻而居，有幸初结识，时光流转，日久爱情生。”——奥维德

book.title: 无名的裘德 Jude the Obscure
book.description: 简介： Jude the Obscure, the last of Thomas Hardy's novels, began as a magazine serial and was first published in book form in 1895. The book was burned publicly by William Walsham How, Bishop of Wakefield, in that same year. Its hero, Jude Fawley...
